info.name: Jacky Wu
info.degree: B.S., Information Management, University of Kaohsiung, Grad. 2019

experience.title: Frontend Developer
content: Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including backend engineers, graphic designers, and project managers
Executed production based on specifications and collaborated with backend engineers to discuss API structures, meeting interface integration requirements

In large-scale projects, focusing on middleware tasks. Responsible for creating API interfaces, converting data types, and handling functions for API requests and payloads between frontend and backend
Proficient in writing logic layer code based on frontend UX and integrating UI components

experience.title: Programming Instructor
content: Guided students below high school level in learning foundational programming languages and provided assistance in completing their projects
Developed a Classroom Student Record System, provided to teachers as a tool for enhancing instruction and recording classroom data

experience.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
content: Built online English teaching platform
Assisted in organizing API documentation and specification files
Developed interface content based on specification documents by using HTML5 and native JavaScript

project.title: ShareHub
project.detail: ShareHub is an English article and image sharing platform that enables users to effortlessly share and explore interesting content.
content: Built with Vue 3, Vite, Element Plus, and Tailwind CSS
Designed for internal use within an English-speaking community in the company, with an estimated user base of approximately 30-50 users

project.title: NUK International Student Application System
project.detail: Designed for international students and administrative staff. The system facilitates online applications and provides comprehensive front-end and back-end functionalities to streamline the application process.
content: Built with PHP, Native JavaScript(ES5) and MySQL
Front-end: Empowering international students to apply to NUK by enabling document uploads, data entry, material downloads, and application progress tracking
Back-end: Facilitating administrative staff at the international affairs office with tools for reviewing student submissions, conducting evaluations, and updating documents from the front-end

project.title: Backstage Management System
project.detail: Designed for administering operations involving data table display, manipulation, and export. Utilizes the Element Plus UI library to provide a rich user interface.
content: Built with Vue 3, Vite, Element Plus, Pinia, Axios, and RESTful API
This project showcases my ability to replicate backend systems based on work-related requirement

project.title: Classroom Student Record System
project.detail: Assist in organizing student information. Key features include student enrollment, drag-and-drop student repositioning, course selection, progress updates, and automated learning record creation.
content: Built with Vue 3, Vite, Pinia, Element Plus, and Tailwind CSS
This project is specially designed for project teaching teachers, and the estimated number of users is about 20

project.title: LogViewer
project.detail: A log viewer system designed specifically for backend engineers in the company. It allows viewing and analyzing a large volume of log records.
content: Built with Vue 3, Vite, Pinia, Element Plus, and Tailwind CSS
The system utilizes Element Plusâ€™s Virtualized Table to display log records, ensuring smooth performance even with large datasets.
